issue.title: [Rust] Add Rust to the format integration testing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3690](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3690). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should add Rust into the integration testing. See [here title](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/integration/integration_test.py#L1166) and [here](https://github.com/apache/arrow/tree/master/integration).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3690?focusedCommentId=17154975) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
It doesn't appear this will be all completed for 1.0.0 so moving out of the milestone

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3690?focusedCommentId=17204368) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Kicking this can down to 3.0.0 as I won't complete all the sub-tasks. I'll try complete what I can for 2.0.0, so we can also update the documentation with what's supported in Rust.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3690?focusedCommentId=17256893) by Qingyou Meng (mqy):*
The  links in issue description are broken, perhaps should be updated to <https://github.com/apache/arrow/tree/master/dev/archery/archery/integration> ?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3690?focusedCommentId=17287424) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I think this is done?
